各位可以来讨论一下改进的地方 当然分类选了闲聊XD 因为也不是什么严肃的事 说实话各位可以随便拿



options:
    World: world_nether

on place of water:
    player's world is "{@World}":
        if gamemode of player is survival:
            player is holding a water bucket:
                if player's inventory contains 1 water bucket:
                    cancel event
                    remove 1 water bucket from player's inventory
                    set event-block to stationary water
                    give 1 bucket to player

on place of water:
    player's world is "{@World}":
        if gamemode of player is creative:
            player is holding a water bucket:
                if player's inventory contains 1 water bucket:
                    cancel event
                    set event-block to stationary water

on break of ice:
    if gamemode of player is survival:
        cancel event
        player's world is "{@World}":
            set event-block to stationary water
        player's world is not "{@World}":
            set block at event-location to air

on break of ice:
    if gamemode of player is survival:
        cancel event
        player's world is "{@World}":
            player is holding a pickaxe of silk touch:
                set event-block to air
